relation: Talk to people, join clubs, go to the park or a new restaurant during your breaks.
You don't even need to eat in the cafe because their are many stores in the surrounding area.
Professors give out a fair amount of work considering it's college. Do your best and you'll have no issues. Also, tutoring is available.
Make sure to always communicate with your professors Don't be afraid to speak to people because you'll probably end up having a lot of classes with them Connect your school e-mail to your cell phone

St. Francis is a good school, it's clean and up-to-date (technologically speaking). Professors are nice and you have a lot of opportunities to get ahead and do well. Also, It's located in a great area.
pageTitle: St Francis College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {116354=There are a lot of activities here at St. Francis. Every Monday form 12:00- 1:00 there are no classes scheduled so students can participate in activities that are going on around the school. This is called Activity Period. During this time there may be information sessions, games in the cafeteria or one of the classrooms, it depends on what is planned out week by week. There are also a lot of filed trips and sporting events to attend; these activities have to be paid for., 122338=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 94915=SFC is great for athletes. However, it's strongest area is most likely Business. Allow me to take the opportunity to say that I write this on Dec.20,2013 and on Dec.23 our Entrepreneurial Club will be ringing the bell at Wall Street.}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students The school is beautiful. The first time I saw it I feel in love with it and knew this is where I was going to go. There are securitys everywhere for you to feel safe. The deans and everybody is so friendly and respectful towards you. Will enjoy being here The college is in the middle of everything. You have the subway right next to you. Manhattan is just one stop away. There are resturants all around the place. There are great people to be with and great hangout spots.
